programme.desc: The FBI's Mulder and Scully seek the truth about conspiracies, extraterrestrials and killer black ooze in this adaptation of the TV series(n)

programme.title: Octopussy
programme.desc: This (13th) time around, 007 (once again played by Roger Moore) receives the usual call to come and visit M when another agent drops off a fake Faberge jeweled egg at the British embassy in East Berlin and is later killed at a traveling circus. Suspicions mount when the assistant manager of the circus Kamal (Louis Jourdan), outbids Bond for the real Faberge piece at Sotheby's. Bond follows Kamal to India where the superspy thwarts many an ingenious attack and encounters the antiheroine of the title (Maud Adams), an international smuggler who runs the circus as a cover for her illegal operations. It does not take long to figure out that Orlov (Steven Berkoff), a decidedly rank Russian general is planning to raise enough money with the fake Faberges to detonate a nuclear bomb in Europe and then defeat NATO forces once and for all in conventional warfare. John Glen returns again to handle directing duties, the second of five Bond films he lensed(n)

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: (2002) Martin Scorsese's multi-Oscar-nominated epic stars Daniel Day-Lewis as William Cutting, the leader of a violent gang in 19th-century New York who take on their rivals, led by "Priest" Vallon (Liam Neeson). Vallon dies and his young son Amsterdam disappears, only to return a man (Leonardo DiCaprio) torn between a thirst for revenge and a fascination for the charismatic Cutting, with Cameron Diaz as Jenny Everdeane, the pickpocket they both love(n)

programme.title: Equity
programme.desc: A senior investment banker tries to prove her worth to her firm by bringing in a tech company that's on the verge of going public. However, the IPO causes her to get tangled up in an investigation into securities fraud in this intense drama(n)

programme.title: Little Miss Sunshine
programme.desc: When a pudgy, bespectacled seven-year-old, Olive (Abigail Breslin), voices her desire to take home the coveted Little Miss Sunshine crown at an upcoming beauty pageant, her wildly dysfunctional family sets out on an interstate road trip to ensure her a clear shot at realizing her dreams in former music video directorial team Jonathan Dayton and Valerie Faris' quirky feature debut, starring Greg Kinnear, Steve Carell, and Toni Collette. Despite early career success as an outspoken motivational speaker, family patriarch Richard (Kinnear) continues to cling to his "Refuse to Lose" philosophy, much to the chagrin of his increasingly annoyed spouse, Sheryl (Collette). Add into the mix a Nietzsche-reading teenage son (Paul Dano) who has taken a vow of silence until he finds his fate as a fighter pilot; a horny, heroin-happy grandfather (Alan Arkin) with a penchant for creative profanity; and a suicidal genius (Carell) and Proust scholar still reeling about losing both his male lover and his MacArthur Foundation genius grant -- and the stage is set for a road trip in which sanity is sure to take the back seat(n)

programme.title: The Shallows
programme.desc: A young surfer is hunted by a great white shark at a secluded beach, and ends up stranded on an embankment away from the shoreline. Alone and wounded, she attempts to survive the attack and get ashore(n)

programme.title: Die Another Day
programme.desc: After being captured while on assignment in North Korea, imprisoned and tortured for more than a year, James Bond teams up with an enigmatic spy named Jinx to take on a madman with a satellite-laser weapon(n)

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: Frank takes a job driving the young son of Miami's anti-drugs tsar. Florida was supposed to be a holiday, but when Colombian killers kidnap the boy and frame Frank, he has to start taking life more seriously(n)

programme.desc: A successful sports agent has an epiphany of conscience and is fired after he puts out a memo stating that he believes everyone in his firm should care more about their clients than the money they make(n)

Bryan Singer ("X-Men") directs this suspenseful thriller. Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy, Tom Wilkinson(n)

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this moving drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones(n)

programme.title: Dos Aguas
programme.desc: A young man aspires to attend an exclusive soccer school that his family can not afford, so his brother attempts to secure the funds(n)

programme.title: Catch a Fire
programme.desc: Patrick, a chemical factory worker in Apartheid South Africa, becomes an ANC activist after unfair treatment at the hands of the authorities. But the police are on his tail(n)

programme.title: The Patience Stone
programme.desc: Author Atiq Rahimi's adapts his own bestselling novel about a Muslim woman whose paralyzed husband unconsciously assumes the role of a magical force, which shields her from the sorrows of life in her war-torn village. Her unnamed Middle Eastern country caught up in an insurrection, the loyal, thirtysomething wife faithfully sits watch over her vegetative husband, who has been all but forgotten by his brothers and fellow Jihadists. Over time, she gathers the courage to tell her husband all of the things she had remained silent about during their 10 years of marriage. Throughout the course of these missives, she speaks frankly of the disappointments, sorrows, and sacrifices that have made her life so difficult throughout the previous decade. Only weeks later, when the isolated wife enters into a relationship with a young soldier, does she begin to reveal the woman who she had kept locked up deep inside ever since the day she was married(n)

programme.title: After Spring
programme.desc: A documentary look at life inside the Zaatari Refugee Camp in Jordan, home to nearly 80,000 Syrian refugees and thousands of children displaced by the unrest in their home country(n)

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this moving drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones(n)

programme.title: Revolutionary Road
programme.desc: Drama based on Richard Yates's acclaimed novel, reuniting the Titanic stars Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet. April and Frank Wheeler are a young, thriving couple living with their two children in a Connecticut suburb in the mid-1950s. Their self-assured exterior masks a creeping frustration at their inability to feel fulfilled in their relationships or careers. Frank is mired in a well-paying but boring office job, and April is a housewife still mourning the demise of her hoped-for acting career. Determined to identify themselves as superior to the mediocre sprawl of suburbanites who surround them, they decide to move to France where they will be better able to develop their true artistic sensibilities, free of the consumerist demands of capitalist America. But as their relationship deteriorates into an endless cycle of squabbling, jealousy and recriminations, their trip and their dreams of self-fulfilment are thrown into jeopardy(n)

programme.title: Coming Home
programme.desc: After a man is released from a labour camp during the last days of the Cultural Revolution, he returns home to find his wife has amnesia and does not recognise him(n)

programme.title: Jack Goes Boating
programme.desc: In this poignant comedy-drama, quirky loners Jack (Philip Seymour Hoffman) and Connie are fixed up on a date by a married couple. As their new relationship begins to make their troubled lives better, Jack takes swim lessons in order to give Connie her dream date on a boat. Meanwhile, the couple who brought them together finds their marriage falling apart. Directed by Philip Seymour Hoffman(n)

programme.title: Pollock
programme.desc: Portraying one of this century's most influential artists, actor and director Ed Harris goes to extraordinary lengths in giving an accurate image of Jackson Pollock's often troublesome life.Jackson Pollock became America's first "Art Star" and his bold paintings changed the course of modern art. But the torments that plagued his days - perhaps the ones that drove him to paint in the first place - haunted him for his whole life. 'Pollock' won one Oscar and the TFCA Award at the Toronto Film Critics Association Awards, 2001(n)

programme.title: The Kids Are All Right
programme.desc: The biological father of a lesbian couple's two teen children enters their lives after the son expresses a desire to find him, and the sperm donor's easygoing demeanor has a profound effect on the family(n)

He plans to drink himself to death within four weeks. He meets Sera, a prostitute; they fall in love and he moves in with her. Each pledges not to try to change the other's chosen destiny, and they carry on a romance over Ben's last weeks(n)

programme.desc: A slacker named Bill lives in the shadow of his more-successful brother Robbie, a blind athlete and local celebrity. When the pair both fall for the same woman, Bill must compete against his arrogant sibling for the first time in this hilarious comedy(n)

programme.desc: Comedian D.L. Hughley performs in San Francisco(n)

programme.title: Career Opportunities
programme.desc: A slacker janitor and a beautiful would-be shoplifter are locked in a department store overnight. As their relationship blossoms, two theives break in for a heist(n)

programme.title: No Pay, Nudity
programme.desc: In this heartfelt dramedy about the unglamorous side of showbiz, a struggling, aging actor must overcome personal and professional strife as he tries to make it and land a career breakthrough(n)

programme.title: Ricki and the Flash
programme.desc: An ageing rocker returns home to her estranged family after years on the road following her dreams, and must face the music as she tries to make things right with her loved ones(n)

programme.title: Delta Farce
programme.desc: When a hard-luck blue-collar worker and his two best friends are mistaken for Army Reservists by a tough-talking Army sergeant, the plane set to fly them to the front lines of Iraq mistakenly drops them in the middle of Mexico to disastrous results in a freewheeling military comedy starring Larry the Cable Guy, Bill Engvall, and D.J. Qualls. Larry (the Cable Guy) has lost his job and his woman in the short span of 24 hours. Convinced that some suds and target shooting are just the right remedies for a broken, jobless heart, Larry sets out with his next-door neighbor Bill (Engvall) and their trigger-happy pal Everett (Qualls) in order to blast off some rounds and down some brews. Their relaxing weekend soon takes an unexpected turn, however, when hard-case Army sergeant Kilgrove (Keith David) mistakes the trio as slacking Army reservists and loads them in a plane bound for Fallujah. Subsequently air-dropped over Mexico due to pilot error, the clueless, wannabe war heroes become convinced that they're actually in the Middle East and set out to save a rural village from what they assume to be an insurgent uprising. Though the thankful locals champion the noble but dimwitted trio for their heroism, the celebration is short-lived as ruthless warlord Carlos Santana (Danny Trejo) pays a personal visit to the town with a plan to confront the fearless warriors who dared to challenge his iron-fist rule(n)

programme.title: One Fine Day
programme.desc: She is a career-minded architect/super Mom, taking on the demands of single parenting in New York City. He is a hard-driving newspaper columnist/every-other-weekend Dad, challenging the improprieties of City Hall. When they are inadvertently thrown together for one chaotic day, the only things they have in common are identical cellular phones. But the next thing they know, they're falling in love(n)

programme.title: Big
programme.desc: Good-natured family comedy about a young boy who wishes he was big and who is shocked to wake up the following morning as a pre-teen boy in a fully-grown man's body(n)

programme.title: A Very Brady Sequel
programme.desc: The '70s-trapped Bradys must travel to Hawaii to save the family after Carol's first husband shows up and threatens their idyllic existence. As Carol is torn between two husbands, Mike struggles to hold the family together and Alice cooks a lot of meat loaf. Shelley Long, Gary Cole, Tim Matheson, Christopher Daniel Barnes, Christine Taylor, Paul Sutera, Jennifer Elise Cox, Henriette Mantel(n)

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: The story of a Playboy Bunny who teaches an awkward sorority about the opposite sex - only to learn that what boys really like is what's on the inside. Tossed out of the Playboy Mansion with nowhere to go, Playboy bunny Shelley Darlington is delivered by fate to the sorority girls of Zeta Alpha Zeta, a clueless bunch who stand to lose their house - unless they can learn what only Shelley can teach them(n)

programme.title: The Pink Panther
programme.desc: The first misadventure of bumbling Inspector Clouseau sees the French sleuth on the trail of a notorious jewel thief known simply as 'The Phantom'(n)

programme.title: The Pink Panther 2
programme.desc: The bumbling Inspector Jacques Clouseau searches for a thief who is stealing treasures from around the world, including the priceless Pink Panther diamond in this comedy of errors sequel(n)

programme.title: Hot Shots!
programme.desc: In the same vein as Airplane! and the Naked Gun series, Jim Abrahams' comedy is an affectionate parody of Top Gun and An Officer and a Gentleman , with pastiches from, among other titles, 91/2 Weeks , Gone with the Wind and The Fabulous Baker Boys . Charlie Sheen plays Lt Topper Hadley, ace of flying aces, needed to wipe out a nuclear installation in a hostile counrty. He finds himself in conflict with Lt Kent Greogry in the air and on the ground for the love of psychiatrist Ramada Thompson, while more comic relief comes from Lloyd Bridges as Thomas 'Tug' Benson, the dimwitted admiral in charge of them all. Hot Shots! Part Deux is on tomorrow night(n)

programme.title: Hot Shots! Part Deux
programme.desc: Topper Harley takes on a rescue mission for American hostages trapped in an unnamed Middle Eastern country. The men behind Airplane! take aim at Sly Stallone and the muscle-pumped heroics of Rambo in a gag-stacked spoof(n)

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: The story of a Playboy Bunny who teaches an awkward sorority about the opposite sex - only to learn that what boys really like is what's on the inside. Tossed out of the Playboy Mansion with nowhere to go, Playboy bunny Shelley Darlington is delivered by fate to the sorority girls of Zeta Alpha Zeta, a clueless bunch who stand to lose their house - unless they can learn what only Shelley can teach them(n)

programme.title: Made of Honor
programme.desc: A handsome and successful bachelor is taken aback when his dream girl asks him to be the "maid" of honor in her upcoming wedding in this romantic comedy starring Patrick Dempsey and Michelle Monaghan. Tom (Dempsey) and Hannah (Monaghan) have been best friends for years. Though all the hard times, Hannah has been the one constant in Tom's life, and the one person he knows he can always rely on. When Hannah leaves for a six-week business trip in Scotland, Tom is surprised to realize how truly lonely he is without her. Life just isn't the same without Hannah around, so the moment she returns, Tom resolves to ask for her hand in marriage. But apparently Hannah's trip wasn't all business, because upon returning home Hannah announces that she has gotten engaged to a dashing Scotsman and will soon be starting a new life overseas. She's convinced that Tom will be thrilled for her, and wants him to play a crucial role in the wedding. His spirits crushed but his love for Hannah stronger than ever before, Tom reluctantly agrees to be the "maid" of honor so that he can prove his love in no uncertain terms and convince her to call off the wedding before true happiness slips through his fingers(n)

programme.title: Ten Thousand Saints
programme.desc: A punk-loving teen moves to New York City in the late '80s with his bohemian dad, and gets caught up in the local music scene in this exhilarating coming-of-age story. He also befriends a girl his age who's coping with an unplanned pregnancy(n)

He initially plans to sell the land, but has second thoughts when he meets waitress Fanny Chenal who, like Provence itself, melts his heart and inspires him to change his avaricious plans(n)

programme.desc: Jane Goodale has everything going for her. She's a producer on a popular daytime talk show and is in a hot romance with the show's dashing executive, Ray. But when the relationship goes awry, Jane begins an extensive study of the male animal in an attempt to understand how and why Ray has so suddenly and inexplicably jilted her(n)

programme.title: Hot Shots!
programme.desc: In the same vein as Airplane! and the Naked Gun series, Jim Abrahams' comedy is an affectionate parody of Top Gun and An Officer and a Gentleman , with pastiches from, among other titles, 91/2 Weeks , Gone with the Wind and The Fabulous Baker Boys . Charlie Sheen plays Lt Topper Hadley, ace of flying aces, needed to wipe out a nuclear installation in a hostile counrty. He finds himself in conflict with Lt Kent Greogry in the air and on the ground for the love of psychiatrist Ramada Thompson, while more comic relief comes from Lloyd Bridges as Thomas 'Tug' Benson, the dimwitted admiral in charge of them all. Hot Shots! Part Deux is on tomorrow night(n)

programme.title: Hot Shots! Part Deux
programme.desc: Topper Harley takes on a rescue mission for American hostages trapped in an unnamed Middle Eastern country. The men behind Airplane! take aim at Sly Stallone and the muscle-pumped heroics of Rambo in a gag-stacked spoof(n)

programme.title: A Good Year
programme.desc: Ridley Scott's romantic comedy, based on Peter Mayle's novel, stars Russell Crowe as Max Skinner, a ruthless stockbroker who unexpectedly inherits a struggling vineyard in Provence from his uncle Henry. He initially plans to sell the land, but has second thoughts when he meets waitress Fanny Chenal who, like Provence itself, melts his heart and inspires him to change his avaricious plans(n)

programme.title: Made of Honor
programme.desc: A handsome and successful bachelor is taken aback when his dream girl asks him to be the "maid" of honor in her upcoming wedding in this romantic comedy starring Patrick Dempsey and Michelle Monaghan. Tom (Dempsey) and Hannah (Monaghan) have been best friends for years. Though all the hard times, Hannah has been the one constant in Tom's life, and the one person he knows he can always rely on. When Hannah leaves for a six-week business trip in Scotland, Tom is surprised to realize how truly lonely he is without her. Life just isn't the same without Hannah around, so the moment she returns, Tom resolves to ask for her hand in marriage. But apparently Hannah's trip wasn't all business, because upon returning home Hannah announces that she has gotten engaged to a dashing Scotsman and will soon be starting a new life overseas. She's convinced that Tom will be thrilled for her, and wants him to play a crucial role in the wedding. His spirits crushed but his love for Hannah stronger than ever before, Tom reluctantly agrees to be the "maid" of honor so that he can prove his love in no uncertain terms and convince her to call off the wedding before true happiness slips through his fingers(n)

programme.title: Someone like You
programme.desc: Jane Goodale has everything going for her. She's a producer on a popular daytime talk show and is in a hot romance with the show's dashing executive, Ray. But when the relationship goes awry, Jane begins an extensive study of the male animal in an attempt to understand how and why Ray has so suddenly and inexplicably jilted her(n)

programme.title: The Original Kings of Comedy
programme.desc: R iotous concert documentary from the 'Kings Of Comedy' stand-up tour(n)

programme.title: Coffy
programme.desc: A nurse goes undercover as a hooker in order to take down a drug dealer and a pimp who have played a part in turning her younger sister into an addict. She discovers her boyfriend, a politician, is corrupt(n)

programme.title: Hustlers Convention
programme.desc: A look at the history of Hustlers Convention, an early influential rap album released in 1973 by Lightnin' Rod(n)

programme.title: Dr. Lucille
programme.desc: The story of Lucille Teasdale, one of the first women surgeons in Canada, and her struggle to gain a foothold in the male-dominated world of medicine. It follows her life as a surgeon in Uganda(n)

programme.title: Kingdom Come
programme.desc: Based on the play +Dearly Departed by David Dean Bottrell and Jessie Jones (who also penned this screenplay), this new comedy from the director of Jason's Lyric looks at a family gathering after one of their clan dies of a stroke. In the midst of a sweltering summer, the Slocumb family convenes. They include Charisse (Jada Pinkett Smith), the long-suffering, frustrated wife of philandering Junior (Anthony Anderson); there's also the Bible-spouting Marguerite (Loretta Devine), who prays to save her hard-living son Royce (Darius McCrary) from a life on welfare. Lucille (Vivica A. Fox) is the devoted family peacekeeper who is struggling with a money-grubbing funeral director, and her husband Ray Bud (L.L. Cool J) has major contempt for his family and wishes he were burying them instead. Kingdom Come also features Cedric the Entertainer as an intestinally challenged reverend and Whoopi Goldberg as the family matriarch(n)

programme.title: Gridlock'd
programme.desc: A social satire about two helpless junkies who face an endless stream of red tape as they attempt to get into a rehab program(n)

programme.title: Cry, the Beloved Country
programme.desc: The story of a Zulu Christian Pastor's journey from a quiet Natal province to a modern, sinister Johannesburg in search of his son, his sister and his brother-all of whom have disappeared into an urban quagmire of crime, sin and political intrigue(n)

programme.title: Red Hook Summer
programme.desc: In this affectionate slice of life, a boy from Atlanta spends a summer in Brooklyn under the watchful eye of his grandfather, a bishop at a local church, and he connects with a pretty girl who expands his understanding of the world(n)

programme.title: Amistad
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins, Morgan Freeman and Djimon Hounsou star in Steven Spielberg's sweeping, vividly portrayed historical drama. Set in 1839, the tale follows African slaves who rebel against their captors before their ship reaches U.S. shores. The film also chronicles their recapture in America and the trial that followed. Matthew McConaughey, Nigel Hawthorne, David Paymer, Pete Postlethwaite, Stellan Skarsgard, Anna Paquin(n)

programme.title: Something New
programme.desc: A career-driven African-American lawyer agrees to a blind date with landscape gardener Brian, but rejects him on sight because he's white. When they are later re- acquainted she starts to fall for him, but worries that her family and friends will react badly(n)

programme.title: Seven Pounds
programme.desc: Will Smith stars in the emotional story of a man who changes the lives of seven strangers(n)

programme.title: Gridlock'd
programme.desc: A social satire about two helpless junkies who face an endless stream of red tape as they attempt to get into a rehab program(n)

programme.title: Red Hook Summer
programme.desc: In this affectionate slice of life, a boy from Atlanta spends a summer in Brooklyn under the watchful eye of his grandfather, a bishop at a local church, and he connects with a pretty girl who expands his understanding of the world(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.sub-title: The Kind of Man You Are
programme.desc: The Kind of Man You Are. Prosecutors turn up the heat, forcing Tommy's plan to divert their attention; Teresi obtains information about Ghost and engineers a blackmail scheme; in his father's absence, Tariq seeks out Kanan(n)

programme.title: The Wood
programme.desc: Rick Famuyiwa's comedy/drama stars Taye Diggs, Richard T Jones from Phone Booth and Omar Epps, seen meeting up on Digg's wedding day. Or rather, not meeting up - he's done a runner but his friends track him down and as they try to give him the courage to make it to the wedding. Their stories are recounted from their youth in the 80s (with Trent Cameron, Duane Finley and Sean Nelson as the younger versions), when they met at high school and follows them through their rites-of-passage - dating, getting involved in a store robbery by mistake, getting their first jobs. Famuyiwa's debut movie, following three black middle class teenagers, has a certain charm and the three leads are ably supported by a cast including Malinda Williams as the cutest girl in school and Tamal Jones as the ex-girlfriend Diggs seeks refuge with in the Wood rather than the Hood(n)

programme.title: Jumpin' at the Boneyard
programme.desc: A South Bronx man (Tim Roth) tries to rehabilitate his crack-addicted brother (Alexis Arquette). Jeanette: Danitra Vance. Mom: Kathleen Chalfant. Simpson: Samuel L. Jackson. Taxi Driver: Luiz Guzman. Cathy: Elizabeth Bracco. Directed by Jeff Stanzler(n)

programme.title: Stargate: Continuum
programme.desc: The Stargate saga continues as an elite military unit races back to Earth following the mysterious disappearance of two key team members, only to find themselves in an alternate reality where the Stargate has never been invented. Somewhere in deep space, the SG-1 team is in serious trouble. Two team members have vanished without a trace, and now the SG-1 unit's only hope for survival is to get back to Earth as quickly as possible. Upon touching down the team is relieved to be home, but deeply disturbed to learn that the reality they just returned to isn't the same one they departed from. In this reality, the Stargate has never been discovered and neither the government nor the military has never even heard of the SG-1 unit. But who altered the Earth's timeline, and why? Upon discovering that a malevolent alien known as Ba'al has been meddling with the planet's timeline in an attempt to conquer Earth, the team must race against time to defeat the most powerful adversary that they have ever faced(n)

programme.title: The Glass Shield
programme.desc: Police thriller about a pair of rookie cops who find themselves victims of corruption within their own force. The first black officer in the sheriff's department struggles against the racially hostile attitudes of the other officers, but finds an ally in the only female member of the department. When their colleagues accuse an innocent man of murder, the precinct's two outsiders have to question their loyalties carefully(n)

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Musical about murder, celebrity, adultery, flashy lawyers, starry-eyed chorines and all that jazz(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.sub-title: The Kind of Man You Are
programme.desc: The Kind of Man You Are. Prosecutors turn up the heat, forcing Tommy's plan to divert their attention; Teresi obtains information about Ghost and engineers a blackmail scheme; in his father's absence, Tariq seeks out Kanan(n)

programme.title: Me, Myself & Irene
programme.desc: A Rhode Island state trooper (Jim Carrey) with a split personality tries to protect a lovely con artist (Renee Zellweger) from foul play in this hilarious film by the Farrelly brothers. The situation becomes even more complicated when each of the officer's personalities begins to fall for the young woman. Chris Cooper, Anthony Anderson, Mongo Brownlee, Jerod Mixon(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.sub-title: The Kind of Man You Are
programme.desc: The Kind of Man You Are. Prosecutors turn up the heat, forcing Tommy's plan to divert their attention; Teresi obtains information about Ghost and engineers a blackmail scheme; in his father's absence, Tariq seeks out Kanan(n)

programme.title: Flyboys
programme.desc: As World War I rages in Europe and Allied forces in France, Italy, and England find their resolve quickly diminishing due to the overwhelming force of the German juggernaut, a handful of brave American soldiers volunteer to join their French counterparts in learning to fly and fighting for freedom from above as the true story of the legendary Lafayette Escadrille comes to the screen in a breathtaking war adventure from Academy Award-winning director Tony Bill and famed producer Dean Devlin. They have come from all over the United States, ready and willing to put their lives on the line despite their country's initial pledge to not get involved with the all-consuming war that rages throughout Europe. Few could have foreseen the challenges faced by the world's first fighter pilots, however, and upon arriving at their aerodrome in France, the aspiring aviators are assigned to a new squadron under the command of war-ravaged Captain Thenault (Jean Reno) and battle-weary American pilot Reed Cassidy -- the sole survivor of his devastated former air brigade. With little encouragement from their fellow aviators and nothing to drive but their unifying goal of taking to the skies and offering up their lives in the name of freedom, the determined airmen of the Lafayette Escadrille set out to make history by embarking on the adventure of a lifetime. James Franco, Martin Henderson, and David Ellison star in a script penned by Phil Sears, Blake T. Evans, and David S. Ward(n)

programme.title: Buffalo Soldiers
programme.desc: Frank Military and Susan Rhinehart scripted this western, a look back at the post-Civil War Black cavalry troops known as the Buffalo Soldiers, the fierce fighting unit previously covered in a PBS four-parter (1970) and an NBC pilot (1979). In the New Mexico Territory, ex-slave Sgt. Wyatt (Danny Glover) and the Buffalo soldiers arrest Captain Draper (Robert Knott) and other Texas Rangers, but politics mean the Rangers are quietly freed later. Back at Fort Craig, Wyatt reports to anti-black General Pike (Tom Bower) and Col. Grierson (Bob Gunton), a white responsible for assembling and supporting the black regiment. A search is underway for Indian chief Victorio (Harrison Lowe). Indian prophet Nana (Chesley Wilson) is tortured in an effort to get him to reveal Victorio's whereabouts. Determining that Victorio is at Rattlesnake Springs, the Buffalo Soldiers head in that direction for a confrontation. Filmed in the desert of Arizona's Cochise County, Buffalo Soldiers premiered December 7, 1997 on TNT(n)

programme.title: The Wood
programme.desc: Rick Famuyiwa's comedy/drama stars Taye Diggs, Richard T Jones from Phone Booth and Omar Epps, seen meeting up on Digg's wedding day. Or rather, not meeting up - he's done a runner but his friends track him down and as they try to give him the courage to make it to the wedding. Their stories are recounted from their youth in the 80s (with Trent Cameron, Duane Finley and Sean Nelson as the younger versions), when they met at high school and follows them through their rites-of-passage - dating, getting involved in a store robbery by mistake, getting their first jobs. programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Musical about murder, celebrity, adultery, flashy lawyers, starry-eyed chorines and all that jazz(n)

programme.title: Momentum
programme.desc: Infiltration expert Alex Farraday inadvertently gets tangled up in a government conspiracy, and is pursued by a deadly assassin and his team after she reveals her identity during a routine heist. As Alex attempts to uncover the truth, she utilises her lethal skills to seek revenge for the murder of her friends(n)

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: A con artist gets a shot at redemption when his mentor asks him to protect a superpowered suit in this high-octane superhero flick. Donning the technology, which shrinks him down to minuscule size, he fights off villains seeking to steal the invention(n)

programme.title: Ponyo
programme.desc: A charming family fantasy-adventure from Hayao Miyazaki - master of Japanese animation and director of Spirited Away and Princess Mononoke - that reworks Hans Christian Andersen's The Little Mermaid. When five-year-old Sosuke is playing down by the water of his fishing town, the last thing he expects to see is a goldfish with girl's face. Her real name is Brunhilde and she's the daughter of Fujomoto, a powerful human wizard who has renounced life on land for one in the ocean's depths. Boy and fish-girl are instantly smitten with each other, and he gives her a new name, Ponyo. She returns to her father to say that she no longer wants to live in the sea and would prefer to be human. Angered at the prospect of losing her, as well as at mankind's ill-treatment of the oceans, Fujimoto unleashes a catastrophe that threatens Ponyo's true love and his terrestrial community..(n)

programme.title: The Little Vampire
programme.desc: Children's spooky fantasy. A lonely nine-year-old boy gets picked on by his classmates when his family move from California to Scotland. He dreams of vampires and one night he meets a vegetarian vampire boy of around his own age and they become friends. The vampire's family hope to become human, but they need the missing part of a magic amulet, and, evading a vampire hunter, the lads set out to obtain it(n)

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: Comedy about Paul Blart, a man who has missed out on his dream of becoming a respected cop and is settling for patrolling the local mall with delusions of grandeur. He takes his role very seriously, much to the chagrin of his colleagues, but he gets his chance to impress when a group of thieves raid the mall(n)

programme.title: Angela Anaconda
programme.sub-title: Touched by an Angel-a; Puppy Love
programme.desc: Touched by an Angel-a; Puppy Love. Angela tries to move past a string of bad luck by being nice to Nanette; Nanette's poodle falls in love with Angela's terrier(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington Bear
programme.sub-title: Paddington Gets a Raise; Bonhomme Paddington; Everything Comes to Those Who Wait
programme.desc: Paddington Gets a Raise; Bonhomme Paddington; Everything Comes to Those Who Wait. Paddington takes a job as a model for a painting class. Also: Paddington takes part in the festivities at the Quebec Winter Carnival; and a night of caroling ends with Paddington at a dinner party, mistaken for the waiter(n)

programme.title: Connie the Cow
programme.sub-title: Going South for the Winter; Wally's Hat; Connie Hunts for Treasure
programme.desc: Going South for the Winter; Wally's Hat; Connie Hunts for Treasure. Connie hears about bird and insect friends planning to go south for the winter(n)

programme.title: Thomas Edison's Secret Lab
programme.sub-title: No Volts for Von Bolt; Dunkin Zombies
programme.desc: No Volts for Von Bolt; Dunkin Zombies. Von Bolt malfunctions while on a sailing trip; and a virus turns JD into a donut-craving zombie(n)

programme.title: Liberty's Kids
programme.desc: American Crisis. It's December 1776 and the American war effort is at its lowest point. "These are the times that try men's souls," writes Thomas Paine (voice of Nils Haaland). The kids see that when they meet General Washington (Cork Ramer). Voice of Ben Franklin: Walter Cronkite(n)

programme.title: The Land Before Time VIII: The Big Freeze
programme.desc: Dinosaur families get caught in an ice storm(n)

programme.title: Dunston Checks In
programme.desc: Mrs. Dubrow desperately wants her hotel to receive the coveted six-star rating, but the critic will arrive incognito. The hotel manager thinks that he spots the agent, but it turns out to be a thief -- who has just arrived with his pet orangutan(n)

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: When two kids play an old magic board-game they release a man trapped for decades and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game. Stars Robin Williams and Kirsten Dunst(n)

programme.title: Dragonheart
programme.desc: The last dragon and a disillusioned dragonslaying knight must cooperate to stop an evil king who was given partial immortality(n)

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: A con artist gets a shot at redemption when his mentor asks him to protect a superpowered suit in this high-octane superhero flick. Donning the technology, which shrinks him down to minuscule size, he fights off villains seeking to steal the invention(n)

programme.title: Heart and Souls
programme.desc: Heart and Souls is an odd reincarnation comedy about a man (Robert Downey Jr.) who has been haunted his entire life by four souls (Charles Grodin, Kyra Sedgewick, Alfre Woodard, Tom Sizemore), who are only visible to himself, and who all died in a bus accident on the night that he was born. Once he becomes a man, he is forced to finish what they could not complete, and each of the four souls inhabits his body at different times as he attempts to take care of their business(n)

programme.title: Supercross
programme.desc: Two siblings find themselves competing on and off the racetrack in this action-packed drama. K.C. Carlyle (Steve Howey) and his kid brother, Trip (Mike Vogel), are both racers in the rough and tumble world of supercross, a revved-up variation on motocross racing in which specially modified motorcycle negotiate specially built dirt tracks that send riders through tricky twists and turns, over rough terrain, and off high-flying jumps. Both are talented racers, but K.C. has a wilder and more reckless approach, while Trip follows a more cautious path. A more profound difference between them arises when K.C. is offered a lucrative deal to ride for a factory-sponsored team; he takes the deal, and leaves his brother behind to race on his own dime. However, when an accident takes Trip out of the running on the supercross circuit, he and K.C. set aside their differences as Trip helps coach his older brother so he can succeed in his drive to the championship. Made with the cooperation of a leading supercross race promoter, Supercross: The Movie also stars Sophia Bush and Cameron Richardson as the brothers' love interests, and Robert Carradine as a determined race coach(n)

programme.title: Moonlight Mile
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman and Susan Sarandon star in writer-director Brad Silberling's heartfelt drama about a New England couple mourning their slain daughter while trying to accept her equally distraught fiancé (Jake Gyllenhaal) as the son they never had. Holly Hunter, Dabney Coleman(n)

programme.title: Huckleberry Finn
programme.desc: Musical adaptation of Mark Twain's 1884 classic about a runaway orphan and a fugitive slave who share adventures on a river raft going down the Mississippi(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In this computer-animated fantasy, dinosaurs never became extinct, allowing an amiable Apatosaurus to befriend a prehistoric human child(n)

programme.title: Beethoven
programme.desc: Feeling that something is lacking in their lives, the family of suburbanite Charles Grodin adopts a stray St. Bernard puppy. The cute lite beast grows up to be the less-than-cute Beethoven, a sloppy, slobbery, oversized and extremely destructive animal. Beethoven also brings with him a lot of hidden baggage in the form of evil veterinarian Dean Jones, who'll stop at nothing to steal Beethoven for the purposes of his insidious lab experiment. Several sequels followed, beginning with 1993 Beethoven's Second(n)

programme.title: Enchanted
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure, combining live action and animation, about a genuine fairytale princess lost in Manhattan. Banished from her magical kingdom on her wedding day by her wicked stepmother, the princess is saved from the chaos of her alien surroundings by a divorce lawyer. As her betrothed hurries to New York in search of his lost love, however, the princess discovers that her heart may instead lie elsewhere(n)

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks 2: Destination London
programme.desc: In England, the teen superspy poses as a music prodigy to thwart a renegade agent's plot to take over the world with a mind-control device. Mildly amusing sequel(n)

programme.title: Fun size: un pequeño gran problema
Fun size: un pequeño gran problema
Killjoys
programme.desc: A Skinner, Darkley. As Dutch and D'avin attempt to train a replacement nerd, John finds his search for Clara is getting under some people's skin(n)

programme.title: Dark Matter
programme.desc: One More Card to Play. It's Raza vs Raza when other dimensional alternates of the crew steal weapons, the real crew must get them back(n)

programme.title: Wynonna Earp
programme.desc: Let's Pretend We're Strangers. The battle for Waverly's soul continues and Wynonna will never be the same(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Piano in the House. An atypical Twilight Zone entry from scriptwriter Earl Hamner, Jr., this episode stars Barry Morse as theatrical critic Fitzgerald Fortune, whose snide cynicism is matched only by his sadistic streak. While seeking out a birthday present for his young wife Esther (Joan Hackett), Fortune happens upon an old player piano, which, when activated, forces the people in its vicinity to reveal their true feelings. Wickedly amused by this, Fortune utilizes the piano at his wife's birthday party, resulting in a deluge of hidden emotions -- and, ultimately, disaster for Fortune himself. Not one of the better Twilight Zone episodes, this one benefits immensely from a stellar supporting cast, including Muriel Landers and Cyril Delevanti. Directed by future Hill Street Blues stalwart David Greene, "A Piano in the House" first aired February 16, 1962(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The Little People. Though it casts all known laws of physics to the four winds, this Rod Serling-scripted Twilight Zone episode scores points on an "important message" level. Arriving on a strange planet, Earth astronauts Peter Craig (Joe Maross) and William Fletcher (Claude Akins) stumble upon a microscopic city populated by teeny tiny people. While Fletcher seeks only to befriend the local citizens, the arrogant, power-hungry Craig is perfectly content to be worshipped as a god. Ordering Fletcher back into the spaceship, Craig stays behind, looking forward to a long and fruitful reign over the little people. . .a reign that comes to an abrupt end in a most ironic fashion. "The Little People" originally aired March 30, 1962(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: High and Low. Nick and Warrick investigate the death of a man who was apparently thrown from the roof of a six-story building. Evidence reveals that he was dead before he hit the ground. Also, Catherine probes the shooting death of a man who was killed with his own gun, and Grissom's hearing problems cause him to drop out of a case. Nick: George Eads. Warrick: Gary Dourdan. Catherine: Marg Helgenberger(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Recipe for Murder. A human arm is discovered stuck in a grinder at a meat-processing factory and the evidence leads Grissom and Catherine to an upscale restaurant where the victim worked as a chef. Across town, Warrick and Sara probe the apparent suicide of a girl with bipolar disorder in her flat, but as the case unfolds, it becomes clear that she was murdered(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Got Murder?. US drama series about a team of forensic investigators in Las Vegas. A car salesman dies twice, and a woman thought to be dead turns up in the flesh following some shady discoveries about her family(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Random Acts of Violence. US Warrick investigates a spate of drive-by shootings. An office boss lies dead for hours before his staff alert the police(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: One Hit Wonder. Catherine investigates a Peeping Tom whose crimes are becoming progressively more serious. Sara reopens an unsolved case in which a colleague's husband was murdered(n)

programme.title: The Heartbreak Kid
programme.desc: (1972) Father Ted Night is rounded off by the influential American film The Heartbreak Kid , starring Charles Grodin, Jeannie Berlin and Cybill Shepherd, which both Graham Linehan and Arthur Mathews cite as a major influence on their comedy writing. Elaine May's romantic tragic-comedy stars Grodin as Lenny Cantrow, newly married to Lila (Berlin). En route to their honeymoon in Miami, he's already beginning to have second doubts after seeing her eat an egg mayo sandwich and hearing her sing the same song over again. At the resort, disaster strikes when Lila gets sunburnt and is confined to their room. Lenny, alone on the beach, suddenly spies Kelly Corcoran (Shepherd) and falls for her on the spot. Dumping Lila, he pursues Kelly to her home in Minnesota and wins her heart. But he soon learns that not everything beautiful is perfect and that people are not just commodities to be cast aside on a whim. Premiere(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Driven. The DA's office faces the difficult task of ensuring equal justice for an African American father and a white mother for their roles in the shooting deaths of two people during a racially-motivated confrontation(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Political Animal. Blood continues to spill on the mean streets of New York. Green (Jesse L Martin) and Lupo (Jeremy Sisto) are tested by a triple homicide, which they initially decide is the grisly result of a lovers' quarrel. As ever, appearances are deceiving and nothing is as it first seems. On closer inspection, the detectives uncover a link to a conman with political connections(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Skate or Die. Detectives Lupo and Bernard investigate a serial killer who targets homeless men and discover that a copycat may be at work(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The Drowned and the Saved. When a prominent charity executive is found dead, Detectives Lupo and Bernard are assigned to the case. During the investigation, blackmail ensues that directly impacts Jack McCoy's campaign(n)

programme.title: Arrow
programme.desc: Crucible. A man called the Mayor brings illegal guns into the Glades, so Oliver sponsors a "Cash for Guns" event to rid the city of weapons. But the Mayor and his gang crash the event and seriously injure Sin. When the Canary learns Sin is in the hospital, she seeks revenge. Meanwhile, Donner asks Laurel to dinner; and Diggle reconnects with an old friend(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Once In A Blue Moon. Leo is suspected when the new Whitelighter assigned to oversee the sisters is savagely mauled just as a blue moon causes the witches' powers to go haywire. Also: Agent Brody (Kerr Smith) confronts Paige about an impending menace; Phoebe's unpredictability creates a rift with Leslie (Nick Lachey)(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Someone to Witch Over Me. Agent Brody and Paige investigate when they discover that the demon Sarpedon is capturing guardian angels and using them to protect himself from a powerful new group of magical beings. Meanwhile, Piper and Phoebe encourage Leo to go on a vision quest to face his demons(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Charmed Noir. Paige and Brody enter into a clichéd 1930s detective novel penned by former pupils of the magic school to solve the murder of a gnome. Elsewhere, Leo's sudden serenity troubles Piper. Agent Brody: Kerr Smith. Eddie: Bug Hall(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: All Dogs Go to Heaven. Dean and Sam investigate what appears to be a werewolf killing, but their probe reveals a skinwalker posing as a family dog is responsible. When the skinwalker takes human form, he warns the brothers that an alpha skinwalker is planning a mass murder(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.sub-title: Clap Your Hands if You Believe
programme.desc: Clap Your Hands if You Believe. Dean is abducted from a crop circle while investigating a UFO sighting. He quickly discovers he isn't dealing with aliens but rather with fairies. Sam searches for him and stumbles upon a world occupied by elves, gnomes and a leprechaun(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Caged Heat. On a trail to locate Sam's soul, the brothers are forced to work for the evil Crowley, until a surprise visit from Meg offers them an alternative..(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Appointment in Samarra. Sam is still soulless and a determined Dean makes a deal with Death in a bid to get his brother back to normal(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Big in the Philippines. A country-music singer's remains are found in a shallow grave, and the Jeffersonian's investigation uncovers his record label's mistreatment of him. Meanwhile, Wendell breaks his arm in a hockey game, but Brennan discovers shocking news when she examines his injury(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Master in the Slop. Sweets goes undercover in the world of professional chess after a champion's body is discovered in pig slop. Meanwhile, Cam balks at being recognised by a science publication since she feels the honour should go to Brennan; and Canadian podiatrist Douglas Filmore visits the Jeffersonian to work as an intern(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Heiress in the Hill. The murder of a millionaire's daughter leads Booth into a messy family situation. Hodgins is in a similar spot when a family secret is revealed(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Source in the Sludge. Booth's concerns rocket when he finds a connection between a recently murdered feminist and shady CIA Agent Danny Beck(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.sub-title: The Repo Man in the Septic Tank
programme.desc: The Repo Man in the Septic Tank. A charming new intern assists Brennan in the lab following the suspicious murder of a bailiff. Could a disgruntled debtor be to blame?(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Carrot in the Kudzu. The investigation of the murder of a children's TV icon takes a detour when his reputation for promiscuity emerges, which leads to a long list of unlikely suspects. Meanwhile, Brennan and Booth get ready for Christine's first birthday; and intern Clark solicits opinions of a novel he's just written(n)

programme.title: Will

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Memo From the Dark Side. Greg Tanner: Creighton James(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.sub-title: Just a Girl in the World
programme.desc: Just a Girl in the World. A crime scene technician is killed, and Detective Lupo jeopardizes the investigation when he gets sexually involved with a second victim who later becomes a suspect in the original case(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Great Satan. Lupo and Bernard investigate after an aspiring musician is found dead behind a bin, and a bag of money left nearby leads them to a number of suspects. One of them confesses to the shooting, but says he only did it because he thought his daughter had been abducted. Further investigation by the detectives reveals that there may be a link between their case and a possible terrorist threat(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Reality Bites. Lupo and Bernard struggle to establish a motive when a woman who adopted 10 children with learning difficulties is murdered(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Dignity. Lupo and Bernard find themselves with a long list of suspects when they investigate the murder of a late-term abortion doctor in a church. The victim had been shot at and threatened on numerous occasions, and his wife is convinced the killer is a pro-life zealot(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Human Flesh Search Engine. The detectives investigate when the owner of a fashion company is murdered. Clues lead Lupo and Bernard to a suspicious website..(n)

programme.title: Law & Order

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Doped. In the first half of the show the detectives work to find the criminals. In the second half the district attorneys work to put them away(n)

programme.title: The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Hapless bounty hunter Milo Boyd (Gerard Butler) jumps for joy at the prospect of tracking down his bail-skipping ex-wife, Nicole Hurley (Jennifer Aniston), but gets a hard dose of reality when the job proves tougher than anticipated. Every time Milo gets close to resourceful reporter Nicole, she gives him the slip. A high-profile murder has been committed, and Nicole is determined to stay out of jail long enough to crack the case. And she must be getting close, because now someone is trying to take them both out. They may not have been able to make marriage work, but if Milo and Nicole can just stay alive long enough to solve the murder, they might discover they're not such a bad team after all(n)

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: After her younger sister is chosen to take part, 16-year-old Katniss Everdeen volunteers to compete in her place in a cruel televised tournament in which 24 teenagers from a postapocalyptic society fight to the death for the entertainment of the masses in a competition known as the "Hunger Games," which are broadcast across the nation as entertainment, and to reinforce the government's total power(n)

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
programme.desc: Katniss and Peeta are forced to participate in the 75th Hunger Games shortly after they go on a tour of the country of Panem and discover that a revolution is brewing(n)
